attributes.action: Rent paid for housing family members
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current housing policy encourages single people to take up council tenancy rather than let a room from a family member as currently policy will not pay rent for accomodation when living with a family member.  

A housing shortage would be relieved by putting single people currently in 2\3 bedroom housing in a position to have families accept them as boarders without risking hardship.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
